full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Translation and Revision Services
#### Description
Transport Canada's Air Policy Group is issuing a tender request for Translation and Revision Services. The purpose of this procurement is to provide high-quality translation services to meet the periodically high and occasionally critical demands for document translation from English to French and French to English.

#### Key Information
| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | Translation and Revision Services |
| ** Tender Reference Number** | cb-5988-54479609 |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| **Contract Value** | TBC |
| **Contract Duration** | Expected start date: 01 September 2023, Expected end date: 31 March 2025 |
| **Regions of Interest** | Nationwide, Canada |

#### Key Requirements
* The selected service provider will be required to translate documents from English to French and French to English.
* Translation services must adhere to the federal government's translation quality standards.
* The service provider must be able to provide 24/7 translation services.
* The service provider must have experience in translating documents related to air transportation.

#### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria
* The service provider must be a Canadian-owned and operated business.
* The service provider must meet the requirements of the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
* Evaluation criteria will include the service provider's technical merit, translation quality, and price.

#### Tender Documents
* The tender documents can be accessed through the [Canada Buy and Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
* The tender documents include the Request for Proposal (RFP) and Amendment 1 and Amendment 2.

#### Contact Information
* For any questions or concerns, please contact Jessica Hanschell at (613) 324-1856 or jessica.hanschell@tc.gc.ca.
